title: Computer Science C.Edge Option Reflective Learning I
prereqCoreqText: Permission of the GCS is required.

title: Computer Science C.Edge Option Reflective Learning II
prereqCoreqText: The following course must be completed previously: COMP 108. Permission of the GCS is required.

title: Fundamentals of Programming
prereqCoreqText: The following course must be completed previously: MATH 201 or equivalent. No prior experience with computers is assumed.

title: System Hardware
prereqCoreqText: The following course must be completed previously: COMP 248. The following courses must be completed previously or concurrently: MATH 203 or Cegep Mathematics 103 or NYA; MATH 204 or Cegep Mathematics 105 or NYC.

title: Mathematics for Computer Science
prereqCoreqText: The following courses must be completed previously: MATH 203 or Cegep Mathematics 103 or NYA; MATH 204 or Cegep Mathematics 105 or NYC.

title: Probability and Statistics for Computer Science
prereqCoreqText: The following course must be completed previously: MATH 205 or Cegep Mathematics 203 or NYB.

title: Object‑Oriented Programming I
prereqCoreqText: The following courses must be completed previously or concurrently: MATH 204 or Cegep Mathematics 105 or NYC.

title: Object‑Oriented Programming II
prereqCoreqText: The following courses must be completed previously: COMP 248; MATH 203 or Cegep Mathematics 103 or NYA. The following courses must be completed previously or concurrently: MATH 205 or Cegep Mathematics 203 or NYB.

title: Computer Architecture
prereqCoreqText: The following course must be completed previously: COMP 346.

title: Data Analytics
prereqCoreqText: The following courses must be completed previously: COMP 233 or ENGR 371; COMP 352; ENCS 282.

title: Introduction to Theoretical Computer Science
prereqCoreqText: The following courses must be completed previously: COMP 232 or COEN 231; and COMP 249 or COEN 244.

title: Combinatorics
prereqCoreqText: The following course must be completed previously: COMP 232; or students must complete have completed 18 credits in post‑Cegep Mathematics prior to enrolling.

title: Advanced Program Design with C++
prereqCoreqText: The following course must be completed previously or concurrently: COMP 352.

title: Operating Systems
prereqCoreqText: The following courses must be completed previously: COMP 228 or SOEN 228; COMP 352.

title: Principles of Programming Languages
prereqCoreqText: The following course must be completed previously: COMP 249.

title: Data Structures and Algorithms
prereqCoreqText: The following course must be completed previously or concurrently: COMP 232. The following courses must be completed previously: COMP 249.

title: Databases
prereqCoreqText: The following courses must be completed previously: COMP 232 or COEN 231; and COMP 352 or COEN 352.

title: Introduction to Software Engineering
prereqCoreqText: The following courses must be completed previously: COMP 352; ENCS 282.

title: Elementary Numerical Methods
prereqCoreqText: The following courses must be completed previously: COMP 232, COMP 249.

title: Techniques in Symbolic Computation
prereqCoreqText: The following courses must be completed previously: MATH 222 or COMP 232 or equivalent; COMP 248 or equivalent.

title: Computer Graphics
prereqCoreqText: The following courses must be completed previously: COMP 232 or COEN 231; COMP 352 or COEN 352.

title: Introduction to Game Development
prereqCoreqText: The following courses must be completed previously: COMP 371.

title: Multicore Programming
prereqCoreqText: The following courses must be completed previously: COMP 346 or COEN 346.

title: Parallel Programming
prereqCoreqText: The following courses must be completed previously: COMP 346 or COEN 346.

title: Machine Learning
prereqCoreqText: The following course must be completed previously: COMP 352.

title: Introduction to Deep Learning
prereqCoreqText: The following course must be completed previously: COMP 352.

title: Geometric Modelling and Processing
prereqCoreqText: The following course must be completed previously: COMP 352.

title: Compiler Design
prereqCoreqText: The following courses must be completed previously: COMP 228 or SOEN 228 or COEN 311; COMP 335; COMP 352 or COEN 352.

title: System Software Design
prereqCoreqText: The following courses must be completed previously: COMP 346.

title: Data Communication and Computer Networks
prereqCoreqText: The following courses must be completed previously: COMP 346.

title: Database Design
prereqCoreqText: The following courses must be completed previously: COMP 353.

title: Design and Analysis of Algorithms
prereqCoreqText: The following courses must be completed previously: COMP 232 or COEN 231; COMP 339; COMP 352 or COEN 352.

title: Artificial Intelligence
prereqCoreqText: The following course must be completed previously: COMP 352 or COEN 352.

title: Pattern Recognition
prereqCoreqText: The following courses must be completed previously: COMP 352.

title: Intelligent Systems
prereqCoreqText: The following course must be completed previously: COMP 352 or COEN 352.

title: Immersive Technologies
prereqCoreqText: The following course must be completed previously: COMP 371.

title: Advanced Game Development
prereqCoreqText: The following course must be completed previously: COMP 361 or ENGR 391; COMP 376.

title: Animation for Computer Games
prereqCoreqText: The following courses must be completed previously: COMP 361 or ENGR 391, COMP 371.

title: Image Processing
prereqCoreqText: The following courses must be completed previously: COMP 352.

title: Information Retrieval and Web Search
prereqCoreqText: The following courses must be completed previously: COMP 233 or ENGR 371; COMP 352.

title: Computer Science Project I
prereqCoreqText: The following courses must be completed previously: ENCS 282. Students must complete 60 credits prior to enrolling. Permission of the Department is required.

title: Computer Science Project II
prereqCoreqText: The following courses must be completed previously or concurrently: COMP 490. Permission of the Department is required.

title: Computational Biology Team Project
prereqCoreqText: The following courses must be completed previously: BIOL 367; COMP 352. Students must complete a minimum of 54 credits in the BCompSc in Health and Life Sciences program prior to enrolling. If prerequisites are not satisfied, permission of the Department is required.

title: Honours Seminar
prereqCoreqText: The following courses must be completed previously: ENCS 282. Registration in the final year of the honours program is required.

title: Topics in Computer Science
prereqCoreqText: Permission of the Department is required.

title: Topics in Computer Science with Lab
prereqCoreqText: Permission of the Department is required.
